https://tmrev.io/movie/110761-Container 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/1WBt5Ahwbqs82kvIAUU9IoXYKq6.jpg Poetic, experimental and different, Container is described by Lukas Moodysson as "a black and white silent movie with sound" and with the following words; "A woman in a man's body. A man in a woman's body. Jesus in Mary's stomach. The water breaks. It floods into me. I can't close the lid. My heart is full." Container
